tool.name: OGS: GMSH2OGS
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'GMSH2OGS'.
tool.command: if [ "$in" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$in.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$in' '${$in.element_identifier}'; fi; GMSH2OGS --in '$in.element_identifier' $validation $boundaries $exclude_lines $gmsh2_physical_id --out output_1.msh

param.name: boundaries
param.label: boundaries
param.help: if set, boundary meshes will be generated

param.name: exclude_lines
param.label: exclude lines
param.help: if set, lines will not be written to the ogs mesh

tool.help: This tool runs the **GMSH2OGS** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
